resource_explanation:
El Plano user's events API(event created by user).

Event attributes :

 - `title` - Represents event name.
 - `description` - Represents event detailed description.
 - `status` - Represents event current status.
   - `confirmed` - The event is confirmed. This is the default status.
   - `tentative` - The event is tentatively confirmed.
   - `cancelled` - The event is cancelled (deleted).

 - `recurrence` - Represents recurrence rules.
 - `timezone` - Timezone settings.
 - `start_at` - Represents when event starts.
 - `end_at` - Represents when event ends.
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes references to the event creator, attached course, and for whom the event was created.
explanation: Creates and returns created event. NOTE : - An authenticated user can create an event for a group or any group member ONLY in the case when the authenticated user is a group owner(group president). - Any authenticated user can create events for himself. - `start_at` should be after or on current date and time and before `end_at` and `end_at` should be after `start_at` See model attributes description in the section description.

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The course identity to which the event is attached

parameters.name: eventable_type
parameters.description: The entity type to which the event is attached(Student, Group)

parameters.name: eventable_id
parameters.description: The entity identity to which the event is attached

requests.request_body: {"event":{"title":"Molestiae iste natus.","description":"Unde at beatae. Natus ea quasi. Aut sit omnis. Quia sed sit. Nisi autem at.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-27","end_at":"2019-08-27","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"],"eventable_id":13,"eventable_type":"Student","course_id":1}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/events" -d '{"event":{"title":"Molestiae iste natus.","description":"Unde at beatae. Natus ea quasi. Aut sit omnis. Quia sed sit. Nisi autem at.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-27","end_at":"2019-08-27","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"],"eventable_id":13,"eventable_type":"Student","course_id":1}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer a83a8cf697c6d9220be7545be34014ba0ee25dff08896a1638084254bea8d43e" \
